description: Mapping from Product ID + variant ID to human-readable names

schema.name: product_id
schema.description: The internal ID of the Samsara product

schema.name: variant_id
schema.description: The internal ID of the product variant

schema.name: variant_name
schema.description: The name of the product variant

schema.name: batch_list_name
schema.description: The batch list name of the product variant
